attributes.action: Remove all adult themed advertising and explicit images from magazines available to persons under 18 years of age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a father I am repeatedly offended by advertising of premium rate phone services and explicit images in magazines such as Powerstation, Kerrang! etc.  Advertisements for mobile phone services and chat lines are deeply offensive and as such should not be included in publications which can be purchased by minors. such advertising and images are unsuitable for inclusion in these publications.

I ask that all magazines which can be bought by minors are banned from carrying such advertising and explicit images, and to restrict such advertising to adult magazines.
